title: New: X Priest X – Sophie K
content: Since emerging last summer, Florida duo X Priest X have gained more and more attention with each track released. With their debut EP out today, the group dropped a new track last week, another dreamy, perfectly produced pop number. Sophie K takes the early 90’s shoegaze sound and morphs it expertly into a modern, sleek perspective, further proof of their potential ability to be real game changers.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
